channel.title: Collaborations on Haoyu Zhang
channel.description: Recent content in Collaborations on Haoyu Zhang

item.title: Scientific collaborations
item.description: As a statistician and data scientist, I sincerely believe collaborations across disciplines are critical to scientific discovery and methodology development. I participated in broad research collaborations, including genetic association analysis for gall bladder cancer, effect-size distribution analysis for fourteen cancers, gene-environment interaction testing, risk factor analysis for bladder cancer, etc.
